REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Permits employment of retired persons without diminution of retirement allowance
Summary: Relates to permitting employment of retired police, firefighters and EMTs without diminution of retirement allowance for periods in excess of two years.
LawCode: Amd ยง211, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to employment of retired persons without diminution of retirement allowance
